entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0189.10184] The filing has reported a value for the element elmd:PrimeRate with a value of 0.085 using the axis VariableRateAxis in the role 00000039 - Disclosure - Financing Arrangements (Details Narrative) on the table us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for elmd:PrimeRate was the member us-gaap:PrimeRateMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element InvestmentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration or DebtInstrumentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration with a value of us-gaap:PrimeRateMember. The member us-gaap:PrimeRateMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of elmd:PrimeRate.
2. Tag the aggregate value of elmd:PrimeRate with a value of 0.085 without the VariableRateAxis axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of elmd:PrimeRate is reported.
The properties of this elmd:PrimeRate fact are: Period :2024-06-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityAxis=us-gaap:RevolvingCreditFacilityMember, us-gaap:VariableRateAxis=us-gaap:PrimeRateMember Unit : pure
Rule Element Id:10184 Rule version: 25.0.0 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1488917/000089710124000422/elmd240883_10k.htm 5781
